temp.fibHeap.stixar.graph.paths
Class AcyclicLP<T>

java.lang.Object
  temp.fibHeap.stixar.graph.search.DFS.Visitor
      temp.fibHeap.stixar.graph.paths.AcyclicLPBase
          temp.fibHeap.stixar.graph.paths.AcyclicLP<T>

public class AcyclicLP<T>
extends AcyclicLPBase

Longests paths in acyclic digraphs with generic attributes.

The longests path in an acyclic graph is determined in linear time and space by exploiting a topological sort of the graph.

Longests paths are called critical paths in the context of scheduling and task graph problems. This algorithm may be used to compute schedules for a set of tasks which have precedence relation.

Constructor Detail

AcyclicLP

public AcyclicLP(Digraph dg,
                 Node source,
                 Node target,
                 NodeMap<T> dMap,
                 EdgeSource<T> wMap,
                 NodeMap<Edge> pMap,
                 NumAdaptor<T> adaptor)
Construct a new longest paths finder.

Parameters:
dg - the digraph in which to find longests paths. This should be acyclic.
source - the vertex from which to find longests paths. This may be null, in which case longest paths from all the DFS roots are computed.
target - the desired target vertex. This can be null, in which case longests paths to all reachable vertex from source are computed.
dMap - a distance map giving distances to each vertex.
wMap - a source of edge weights.
pMap - a map in which to place the predecessor edges of the longests path tree for each vertex. This may be null, in which case a parent map is created and may be retrieved by the AcyclicLPBase.parents method.
adaptor - an adaptor for longests paths for generic types.
See Also:
NumAdaptor.Int, NumAdaptor.Float, NumAdaptor.Long, NumAdaptor.Double
